SELECT id,report_id reportId,report_type reportType,upload_path uploadPath,appointment_time appointmentTime,state,`handler`,handler_id handlerId, handle_phone handlePhone,create_time createTime,serve_addr serveAddr,audit,audit_phone auditPhone,audit_id auditId,content FROM ht_repairs WHERE UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(appointment_time,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(appointment_time,'-',-1)))-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'))>=0 AND state=0
